page.title: 15A CHILD'S DAY West Forres
page.content: Joanne.Today I got up at 7.15a.m. and had breakfast.I left for school at 8.45 a.m. and called for my friends on the way.School starts at 9.00 a.m. We come into class and read for half an hour.Today we had part of our sports.Our class,Primary 6,ran 100 metres and 400 metres races.I came fourth in both.After doing some Maths I had my Cycling Proficiency Test.I was pleased to pass.At 12.15 I went home for lunch.I had chips and cold roast beef.School starts again at 1.15 p.m. before that I practised three-legged race with Kirsten.In the afternoon we worked on our Domesday Project.At 3.15p.m. I went home.Some of my friends stayed after school for Gardening Club.I changed from my uniform into into a skirt and top and played tennis with Wendy.Afterwards I watched Coronation Street.
